definition: Mt Jiuhua in Anhui, one of the Four Sacred Mountains and Bodhimanda of Kṣitigarbha 地藏
nine/9
magnificent/splendid/flowery
old variant of 花[hua1]/flower
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
abbr. for China
surname Shan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Mt Jiuhua Located in the south of Qingyang County, Anhui Province, the Jiuhua Moutain is one of China's four Buddhist shrines.
sentences.chinese: 九华山位于安徽省青阳县南，中国四大佛教名山之一。

sentences.english: Through the analysis ofthe grain of the sediment of the Quaternary of Mt.
sentences.chinese: 九华山第四纪“泥砾沉积物”成因有很大争议。

sentences.english: The associated gold in Jiuhuashan copper deposit is significant for comprehensive utilization.
sentences.chinese: 九华山铜矿床中伴生金已具综合利用价值。

sentences.english: My hometown is Chizhou Anhui. There is a beautiful mountain named Jiuhuashan locates in this city.
sentences.chinese: 我的家乡是安徽池州，那里有美丽的九华山。

sentences.english: The double-arch was applied in Jiuhua Mountain tunnel and two cracked rocks were drilled through.
sentences.chinese: 九华山隧道采用大跨度双连拱穿过两个破碎带。

sentences.english: View of a temple and the valley from Greater Tiantai peak.
sentences.chinese: 从九华山大天台上看寺庙和山谷。

sentences.english: About 100,000 South Korean visitors come to Jiuhua Mountain every year.
sentences.chinese: 据了解，每年大约有10万韩国游客来访九华山。

sentences.english: My hometown is Chizhou Anhui which is located near the beautiful Jiuhuashan mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我的家乡是安徽池州，那里有美丽的九华山。

sentences.english: The statue that was built at Jiuhua Mountain in central China depicts Vairocana Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 这座雕像是建于中国中部九华山描绘毘卢遮那佛。

sentences.english: Mt. Jiuhua is one of the four famous Buddhist establishments in China.
sentences.chinese: 莲花佛国九华山是中国佛教四大名山之一。

sentences.english: It was a fine day in May. I took a bus to Mount Jiuhua.
sentences.chinese: 那是五月的一个晴天，我乘车去九华山。

sentences.english: There are two kinds of matte slags at Jiuhuashan Tang Dynasty Mining and Smelting Site.
sentences.chinese: 九华山唐代冶铜遗址内发现了两种冰铜渣。

sentences.english: The Jiuhua Mountain is surrounded by trees, and is a tourist resort.
sentences.chinese: 九华山树木蓊郁，环境清幽，是个旅游圣地。

sentences.english: All these precious sutras and cultural relics are on display in the Historical Relics Museum of the Jiuhua Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 这些文物，现都集中在九华山历史文物馆展出。

definition: Mt Wutai in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1], one of the Four Sacred Mountains and home of the Bodhimanda of Manjushri 文殊[Wen2 shu1]

Mt Tiantai near Shaoxing 紹興|绍兴[Shao4 xing1] in Zhejiang, the center of Tiantai Buddhism 天台宗[Tian1 tai2 zong1]
Wudang Mountain range in northwest Hubei
Lushan district of Jiujiang city 九江市, Jiangxi/Mt Lushan in Jiujiang, famous as summer holiday spot

Mt Song in Henan, central mountain of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]

Yandang mountains, famous scenic area in southeast Zhejiang
mountain of Immortals
